title: Can you still re-install the League Alpha Client if you delete it?
body: I was just wondering because I was gonna uninstall league on my computer for a while and was wondering if I could still reinstall the alpha client later on?

replies.body:
Yup, you can always download the installer from [this link](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download) if you need to.

Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
This only allows me to download the game itself, it says that i need to re-install the League alpha client. Can this be done because I can't find anywhere to do so.
Yes, you can always upgrade to the New Client after installing the base client. There's no standalone installer for the New Client just yet, but there may be on in the future.
